Ok here's the reading order for those asking : Chapter 0 to 4 : https://nhentai.net/g/294399/ Chapter 1.5 : https://nhentai.net/g/193905/ Chapter 4.5 : https://nhentai.net/g/200958/ Chapter 5 : https://nhentai.net/g/228018/ Chapter 5.5 (ExE 14) : https://nhentai.net/g/295464/ Chapter 6 (ExE 9) : https://nhentai.net/g/228019/ Chapter 7-8.5 (ExE 11-13) : https://nhentai.net/g/243948/ After this is my guess since DISTANCE didn't bother to write the chapter number " Chapter 9-10 (ExE 15-19): https://nhentai.net/g/306758/ Chapter 11 (ExE 20) : https://nhentai.net/g/326639/ Then goes back to numbering the chapter : Chapter 12 (ExE 24) : this Chapter 13 (ExE 25) : https://nhentai.net/g/324437/ 

Adding chapters:

14 - https://nhentai.net/g/329751/

There you have it. Hope it helps and clear some confusion.
@yaykabb There are a few chapters after the original tank in the Anekomori tank as well. Though the ending seems to have been retconned lol

@yaykabb 15 came out in ExE 28, but it's nice to know you checked the ExE out. ExE 29 contains another solo(I think) piece.

For those who want story canon order (which already translated):
1. Original Joshi Luck (First tankoubon, translated, 2014)
2. 2 years later Ch 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 4.5, (Second tankoubon, translated, 2017) 
3. 5, 5.5, 6, 7, 8, 8.5, Shirogane's, Satsuki's, 12, 13, 14, and here's 15. 
It is actually came out in ExE's 29 but not checked it yet, it is this series or not.
